fn.p: Key to abbreviations: W, wild; C, cultivated; I, invasive; H, herb; S, shrub; T, Tree; ROA, Route of administration; O, oral; top, topical; FC, frequency citation; RFC, relative frequency of citation; UR, use report; UV, use value; FL, fidelity level; CS, Conservation status; D, dominant; E, Endangered; I, infrequent; R, rare; V, vulnerable.
